# Join Our Data Science Team

## Position Overview  
We are looking for a passionate Data Scientist to help us unlock insights from our vast datasets and drive data-informed decision making.

## What You'll Do
- Build and deploy machine learning models
- Perform statistical analysis and A/B testing
- Create data visualizations and reports
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams

## Our Data Stack
We work with cutting-edge tools and technologies including:
- Python and R for analysis
- TensorFlow and PyTorch for ML
- Spark for big data processing  
- Tableau for visualization

## Growth Opportunities
- Work on diverse business problems
- Present findings to executive leadership
- Contribute to our data science blog
- Attend conferences and training
Employment Type:
### Education & Experience
- MS/PhD in Statistics, Computer Science, or related field
- 2+ years of data science experience
- Strong programming skills in Python or R

### Technical Skills
- Machine learning algorithms and frameworks
- Statistical analysis and hypothesis testing
- SQL and database management
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure)

### Soft Skills  
- Excellent communication abilities
- Strong problem-solving mindset
- Ability to work in fast-paced environment
